subject: Re: Hi Everyone!
author: kolrone
full_text:
Welcome! What kind of box are you two doing? Is it the shackhack?

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "suzyq6819" <suzyq6819@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all!  My name is Suzanne, my husband is Sarge and we're new to the 
> group.  We recently formed MMPS or MI Metro Paranormal Society.  We 
> have thirteen members and are based in southern lower MI.
> We're so happy to have found this group!  My husband is working on our 
> first 'box'.  I'm amazed at what I've heard and can't wait to try ours 
> out!  Have a wonderful day everyone :)
>
